doc.after: Lufthansa's long-haul Economy Class is offered on all long-haul aircraft. All have a 31-inch (790Â mm) seat pitch except the Airbus A340s, which have a 32-inch (810Â mm) seat pitch. Passengers receive meals, as well as free drinks. Moreover, the whole fleet offers Audio-Video-On-Demand (AVOD) screens in Economy Class.
